lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Oct. 3 -- The revolt of the Yugoslavs has attained the proportions of warfare, and with new disorders in Croatia and large-scale daytime attacks by Serbian irregular army units in South and Central Serbia, the Reich and Italy actually are faced with a newly developing Balkan front, according to reports tonight from foreign military sources here.
abstract: Croat Ankara sources speculate on Vienna visit
